page.title: 18Employment in Papa Westray
page.content: In 1985 there are 17 farms and crofts which support about 63 people about 20 of whom are also employed part time in other jobs e.g.airfield attendants, shipping agent, dockers, harbour master, postman, registrar,school janitor, home helps etc. There is one inshore fishing boat which provides work for 3:a contractors business which undertakes all building skills and employs 4:the Community Cooperative complex which employs 2 full time and 2 part time staff permanently and 4 or 5 part time during the tourist season: a sub post office which employs 2. In full time employment are a nurse, a school cook and 2 teachers, one of whom is employed on the island and the other who crosses daily to the neighbouring island of Westray.
